verses.verse: <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H121>Adam.<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> him in <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1823>likeness.<s%>

He <S%H1254>created<s%> them <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H7121>them,<s%> and called their <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H120>"Adam,<s%>" in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when they were <S%H1254>created.<s%>

<S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of a son in his own <S%H1823>likeness,<s%> after his <S%H6754>image,<s%> and <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H8352>Seth.<s%>

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8352>Seth<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> that <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H2425>lived<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
<S%H8352>Seth<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H583>Enosh.<s%>

<S%H8352>Seth<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H583>Enosh<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8352>Seth<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
<S%H583>Enosh<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7018>Kenan.<s%>

<S%H583>Enosh<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7018>Kenan,<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6240>fifteen<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H583>Enosh<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
<S%H7018>Kenan<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalalel.<s%>

<S%H7018>Kenan<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalalel<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>
and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7018>Kenan<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
<S%H4111>Mahalalel<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%>- <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3382>Jared.<s%>

<S%H4111>Mahalalel<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3382>Jared<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalalel<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%>- <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
<S%H3382>Jared<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2585>Enoch.<s%>

<S%H3382>Jared<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3382>Jared<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
<S%H2585>Enoch<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4968>Methuselah.<s%>

<S%H2585>Enoch<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4968>Methuselah<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
<S%H2585>Enoch<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H430>God,<s%> and he was <S%H430>not,<s%> for God took <S%H3947>him.<s%>
<S%H4968>Methuselah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech.<s%>

<S%H4968>Methuselah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4968>Methuselah<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
<S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of a <S%H1121>son,<s%>

and he <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "This same will <S%H5162>comfort<s%> us in our <S%H4639>work<s%> and in the <S%H6093>toil<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H779>cursed.<s%>"

<S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

<S%H5146>Noah<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and <S%H5146>Noah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%>
